ygData.subject: Re: Fw: I have quit Everquest
ygData.msgSnippet: heheh, my numbers of calls handled is about the top 3 in the whole of the call centre even when I was playing EQ. hahah. ... From: Sereph
ygData.messageBody:
heheh, my numbers of calls handled is about the top 3 in the whole of
the call centre even when I was playing EQ. hahah.
----- Original Message -----
From: Sereph <garford@...>
To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, October 27, 1999 16:14
Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Fw: I have quit Everquest


> From: Sereph <garford@...>
>
> Forget the most importan thing, good luck with your damn job now that you
are not
> playing anymore EQ, I expect customer services of PI to increase 10 folds!
>
> Sereph wrote:
>
> > From: Sereph <garford@...>
> >
> > Don't you think this is a bit rashed? I chao chao also have endure EQ
for nearly
> > 2 years now and stil manage to tahan the camping etc..... by NOT camping
for
> > items unless friends are camping or if soloing for XP, spam guildsay or
talk
> > cock with other people.
> >
> > They way with EQ is as you say level level level then at 50 camp items
blah blah
> > blah, but you can do other things like run around the various karana
plains and
> > admire the sight or enter a low level dungeon and help newbies survive,
else if
> > you everday camp item also can go gila.
> >
> > You can also do the long boring quest that eq has, heck, if you want to
kill
> > Lucan, just send a tell and I help take 1 HT from him before dying......
> >
> > Else do the most common thing people do when they are sick of EQ,
restart! This
> > time around, go more slowly, wait for kakis to join up, play a diferent
class,
> > go to other hunting grounds you have never hunt in before. This will
make it
> > slightly more enjoyable and is a good chance to meet up with new people.
> >
> > The over level 30 population in Inno is now at at all time low with you
> > leaving....... Once either Zan, FF or Merns leave, I better pack up and
zhao as
> > well.....
> >
> > Bottomline, get your arse back into EQ and slave with the rest of
us........ and
> > if you do return, don't play for so long, play for shorter periods and
forcus
> > more of fun and interaction.
> >
> > Fesse Estasis, Cleric who is working on her KOS faction.
> >
> > Gary Qui Hong Loong wrote:
> >
> > > From: "Gary Qui Hong Loong" <kanglun@...>
> > >
> > > ----- Original Message -----
> > > From: Gary Qui Hong Loong <kanglun@...>
> > > To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
> > > Sent: Tuesday, October 26, 1999 17:26
> > > Subject: I have quit Everquest
> > >
> > > > Hi all,
> > > > Dued to my failure at PoF which got alot of ppl into trouble
> > > (which
> > > > involved dying and losing the major portion of their stuff) and with
> > > little
> > > > else to do (except like camping for stuff, which I have gotten very
sick
> > > and
> > > > tired of), I have cancelled my account as from today, Oct 26th 1999.
Zand,
> > > > please give out the items to the people as I have listed down with
you.
> > > > Especially Weadaenye, whom I'm guilty as hell to got her into a
living
> > > hell.
> > > >
> > > > Please help me tell the follow people of my quiting and hope
to
> > > see
> > > > them again sometime on another game another time and Best wishes to
them.
> > > >
> > > > Daedor, Aildiin, Iyenya, Ironbuket, Hoppy, Kitiarra, Stella,
> > > > Saintly, Valadine, Millie, Silph, Lunatictiara, Ader, Fost, Sparrow,
> > > > Demitry, Wlyven, Anima and Nismo/Volk (they are brothers sharing the
same
> > > > account).
> > > >
> > > > Everquest was, had been and enjoyable game at the beginning
but
> > > due
> > > > to the way that the game is designed it reminds me more of Evercamp,
> > > > Everbitch etc etc. It has become a torture to enter the "game" each
day
> > > now.
> > > > This incident has at least freed me from Evercrack as some would say
it
> > > is.
> > > > So farewell my fellow guildmates. And may your time in Everquest be
as
> > > your
> > > > first day, with new and exciting adventures each day.
> > > >
> > > > Garren The Broken Paladin.
> > > >
> > >
> > > > Singapore Everquest Players List
> >

>
